sentences.sContent: Hester is overshadowed by her younger and more attractive sister.
sentences.sCn: 她那更年轻而且更有魅力的妹妹使赫斯特黯然失色。

synos.tran: 使失色；使阴暗；遮阴；夺去…的光彩

remMethod.val: over (在…上) + shadow (阴影) → 给…蒙上阴影 → 使…失色

trans.tranCn: 使失色；使阴暗；遮阴；夺去…的光彩
trans.tranOther: If you are overshadowed by a person or thing, you are less successful, important, or impressive than they are
